item.title: Half the road, the footpath and first 100 m of the park path is flooded, 18th December
item.description:
Half the road, the footpath and first 100 m of the park path is flooded by the bus shelter near Swindon Village Primary School
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Overflowing drain flooding road, 18th December
item.description:
Drain outside Roseville, pavement drain cover lifted. Flooding outside several properties, cars driving through water make it difficult and dangerous to exit properties on foot

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street cleaning needed, 18th December
item.description:
Pine needles blocking drains in the pull in on East end Rd by Peel Close entrance, street cleaning urgently needed, drains in road are bubbling over with amount of rain, also outside Balcarras School Needles are always there Cheltenham Borough Council never sweep them up there are piles and piles of them
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, East End Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked. Been so for a least two weeks even when not raining. If rain continues danger of reaching properties. Needs immediate unblocking., 18th December
item.description:
